alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hamilton; Kearny; Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:27PM CDT until June 17 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... Eastern Morton County in southwestern Kansas... Kearny County in southwestern Kansas... Grant County in southwestern Kansas... Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... Eastern Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 730 PM CDT/630 PM MDT/. * At 626 PM CDT/526 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 17 miles southeast of Tribune to 6 miles south of Rolla, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Woods. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/ for southwestern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/ for southwestern Kansas.

area.areaDesc: Grant; Hamilton; Kearny; Morton; Stanton; Stevens
